song.title: Let There Be Light
song.lyrics:
[INTRO] .A E D A
[1] .A There’s no darkness in Your eyes .E D There’s no question in Your mind . E D God almighty, God of mercy || .A There’s no hiding from Your face .E D There’s no striving in Your grace .D E D Your grace God of mercy, God almighty
[C1] . A Let there be light . D Open the eyes of the blind . E Purify our hearts in Your fire || . D Breathe in us we pray . A Jesus have Your way
[C2] . A Let there be light . D Open our eyes to Your heart . E Desperate just to know who You are || . D Shine in us we pray . A Jesus have Your way --- [2] There’s no borders in Your love No division in Your heart God of heaven, God of freedom || There’s no taking back the cross No regret in what it cost God of freedom, God of heaven
[3] Let the light that shines above Become the light that shines in us There’s no darkness in Your way || So have Your way Lord have Your way
[Instrumental] .A Bm F#m D
[B] .A Good news embracing the poor .Bm Comfort for all those who mourn .F#m D For the broken hearted we sing louder || .A Release from prison and shame .Bm Oppression turning to praise .F#m D For every captive sing louder || .A Restoring sight to the blind .Bm Breaking the curse of the night .F#m D For all in darkness sing louder || .A Proclaiming freedom for all .Bm This is the day of the Lord .F#m Beauty for ashes
